blogPost.excerpt: Queentessence empowers physical venues, to understand their customers—just as online businesses do. Our platform enables you to gather & analyze data through wireless hotspots, so you can predict demand, send special offers & conduct email marketing campaigns.
blogPost.body: Queentessence empowers physical venues, to understand their customers—just as online businesses do. Our platform enables you to gather & analyze data through wireless hotspots, so you can predict demand, send special offers & conduct email marketing campaigns.
blogPost.title: Queentessence - Digital marketing platform for physical venues
blogPost.author: Yuval Elkeslasi

localize.description: Queentessence让实体店了解他们的客户--就像在线业务一样。我们的平台使您能够通过无线热点收集和分析数据，因此您可以预测需求，发送特别优惠和进行电子邮件营销活动。
localize.tagline: 实体场馆的数字营销平台

localize.description: Queentessence讓實體店瞭解他們的客戶--就像在線業務一樣。我們的平臺使您能夠通過無線熱點收集和分析數據，因此您可以預測需求，發送特別優惠和進行電子郵件營銷活動。
localize.tagline: 實體場館的數字營銷平臺

next.excerpt: Over 60 of the world's top crypto artists provided artwork, this is cut apart at specific points and randomly assembled and generated using AI and stored as an NFT in the blockchain.
next.title: Artvatars - AI generated artworks, stored in the blockchain

localize.description: 超过60位世界顶级的加密艺术家提供了艺术品，这些艺术品在特定的点上被切割开来，用AI随机组装生成，并作为NFT存储在区块链中。
localize.tagline: AI生成的艺术品，存储在区块链中。

localize.description: 超過60位世界頂級的加密藝術家提供了藝術品，這些藝術品在特定的點上被切割開來，用AI隨機組裝生成，並作爲NFT存儲在區塊鏈中。
localize.tagline: AI生成的藝術品，存儲在區塊鏈中。
